channel.title: Music that fits to black mesa
channel.description:
Well, as you can see at the title, post music links(to youtube) from what you think it fits at Black Mesa
Like this: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vf4_g8fyOXI[/url] It's not about the singing guy, but about the melody...

item.title: Music that fits to black mesa
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
If Erasure sucks, then Black Mesa is for girls.

item.title: Music that fits to black mesa
item.dc:creator: Sofa_King_Awesome
item.description:
ManlyStump:

Now I use youtube a lot, but somehow I forgot that it plays the video automatically, and opened all three links at the same time. I got quite an interesting outcome!

Oh yeah, and they all suck.

Hahahaha, I think I like it better with all of them playing at once, an yes, they all do suck.

Read full topic

item.title: Music that fits to black mesa
item.dc:creator: Shnazliztur
item.description:
I like listening to mellower music like from HL2, i have my copy of all the VALVe soundtrack, highlight them, select play in quicktime and it sorta worked in HL1 source. If someone could inform me how to change up the sound track a bit, that would be nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Music that fits to black mesa
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
Dias:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pYU7oG2V7uc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FUaKxFjlOpw
^ a dozen times more fitting than anything posted so far, or will be posted.

Now I use youtube a lot, but somehow I forgot that it plays the video automatically, and opened all three links at the same time. I got quite an interesting outcome!

Oh yeah, and they all suck.

Read full topic

item.title: Music that fits to black mesa
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
these are allegedly the lyrics to that song:

Want to stay young?
Well abort now.
Otherwise you’re going to make
a great dead cop.
Bet you think you are going to change color
standing there on all four feet
getting licked like a lollipop.

Read full topic

item.description:
mattemuse:

this fits to the forums
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DUce8VGl-Y&feature=related

One thing I never understood about that kind of music. Do they actual bother writing lyrics or do they consider it to be pissing in the wind?
